name: Lillybot
effectText: When this card is Normal Summoned or flipped face-up: You can target 1 "Orbital 7" in your GY; Special Summon that target in face-up Attack Position or face-down Defense Position. Once per turn: You can Tribute any number of Machine monsters; Special Summon an equal number of "Photon" and/or "Galaxy" monsters from your hand.
